location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J F Longlands, on board the Fazal Karimto William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that his instructions to move the ship will be heeded to (precisely where the ship is to be moved to and why is not specified), but due to 'bad accommodation' his stock is low so the Resident should obtain what stock he can.The letter is not dated, however it was received at the Bushire Residency sometime between 3 and 11 August 1815.
